data.title: CRUISE SHIPS SLOWLY PICK UP STEAM
data.meta_description: After years of tough competition from cut-price airlines and a growing number of coastal resorts, cruise ships are making a slow but steady comeback in Australia.
data.text:
After years of tough competition from cut-price airlines and a growing number of coastal resorts, cruise ships are making a slow but steady comeback in Australia.

Determined to lift their share of the Australian travel market, shipping lines are repackaging their products and fighting harder than ever to convince holidaymakers that they should take a break at sea.

Loading...
